extendedInfo.description: ** If you are looking for the version that supports the new Basecamp please click here http://goo.gl/JHI5Q **Camper is currently in BETA and FREE and supports ONLY Basecamp Classic.The best Android application for Basecamp. Camper features complete offline browsing and editing capabilities with quick updates to your favorite projects and to-dos. It is the fastest Basecamp client.Time tracking includes a rate option that allows you to set a rate and view the total billable cost for a project. Rates and currency symbol of rates can be changed or disabled from the settings.Current beta supports:â NotificationsâÂ My Dashboard - View To-dos assigned to you across projectsâÂ View all To-dos assigned to a personâ Time tracking (Supported only at Project level)â Adding/completing/editing To-do lists, milestones, and messagesâ Files/Attachments and view from within appComing soon:â Time Tracking at To-do item levelâ People (Contacts)Permissions required:â  Directly Call Phone Numbers - Only used when you want to directly call the author of the comment/to-do/message using the app shortcut. The app will never call anyone without your permission.The names of BasecampÂ® and 37signals are registered trademarks of 37signals, LLC. Camper is in no way affiliated with 37signals.

reviews.title: one of a kind
reviews.comment: very nice interface, easy to use, fast and responsive. awesome
reviews.author: Gustavo Parrado

reviews.title: These guys rock!
reviews.comment: A great app that I used for months with total satisfaction. Experienced some trouble when my beta version expired, but when I called it to the developers attention they resolved it immediately. So rare to enjoy a great product with even greater service.
reviews.author: Jason Russell

reviews.title: Makes organising my life a breeze
reviews.comment: Love everything except that I can\'t search by tasks due on a set day...  Have to look at them all. Unless I\'m missing something :-)
reviews.author: Jo Harrison

reviews.comment: I use it mainly to log my daily hours and works very well. Would have been 5 stars if you had the ability to see the overview of a job.
reviews.author: Phil Taylor

reviews.title: cant get past log in
reviews.comment: asks for company name, i have a trail of basecamp and it does not have this
reviews.author: Dominik Zynis

reviews.comment: Great app for basic base camp integration.
reviews.author: Chris Keller

reviews.comment: Works great. Easy access to all my files
reviews.author: Karen Jacke

reviews.title: obsolete
reviews.comment: doesn\'t work with the latest basecamp
reviews.author: Mahmoud Said

reviews.title: Nice work.  Works great.
reviews.comment: Keep the updates coming! Most useful app on the market.  Sweetness.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome version
reviews.comment: Please do not change a thing it works perfect.
reviews.author: Joshua Butler

reviews.title: No issues
reviews.comment: Seems to work just fine.
reviews.author: Jeremy Smith

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Haven\'t used much. But UI and navigation is really good and user friendly. Great job guys.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: This app is amazing. It works well, it is fast, reliable and provides a very needed \"extra push\" to Basecamp. I doesn\'t not feel like a beta product. Great job guys! Totally recommended.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: An excellent mobile interface for Basecamp, particularly useful on older Android OS versions and browsers that don\'t play very well with 37Signals\' mobile site. I use it for \"legacy\" Basecamp, not sure how it performs with the new site.  I\'d love to see some quick-access widgets and increased functionality, but for the price I certainly can\'t complain.
reviews.author: Dan Hoelck

reviews.title: Nice app...ez access to basecamp
reviews.comment: Nice addition would be notification of new posts
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great start, but I wonder why the contacts can\'t be viewed and added separately
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app for Basecamp
reviews.comment: Would recommend using for mobile management of projects.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy usability
reviews.comment: I started using this to manage projects and it works just as well as the website I fully recommend this app.   I\'m running on a GNex rooted/ROMed/OC
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It works.
reviews.comment: This app delivers. I\'d give it five stars if it worked quicker. A widget for to dos would be great. But it does it\'s job as is.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App for Basecamp
reviews.comment: More features would really help
reviews.author: Olivier Agustin
